h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: From this point on, Mind Cores are far more common and can be found from defeating bosses, and exploring some of the off-the-beaten-path areas. So, be sure to keep exploring!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mind_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Mind Core', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Mind Core Location 12'.
The content is as follows:
From this point on, Mind Cores are far more common and can be found from defeating bosses, and exploring some of the off-the-beaten-path areas. So, be sure to keep exploring!
